name: Corner Spa Suite | 1 King
description: Corner suite in the Spa Tower featuring spa-inspired amenities, one king-size bed, and luxurious appointments. Enjoy the elevated Spa Tower experience with premium toiletries, plush robes, and access to the resort's spa facilities.
shortDescription: Luxurious corner suite in the Spa Tower with spa-inspired amenities and premium appointments.

meta.title: Corner Spa Suite 1 King – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Corner Spa Suite at Eldorado Resort Reno – luxurious spa-inspired accommodations in the Spa Tower.

testimonials.quote: Corner Spa Suite | 1 King was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Rick B.
testimonials.meta: Yelp · date night during golf trip

testimonials.quote: Visited Corner Spa Suite | 1 King during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Amanda T.
testimonials.meta: TripAdvisor · date night during golf trip
